page.title: 14LIFE STYLES
page.content: {HOTELS, FASHION, ACTIVITIES. { {HOTELS :}WE HAVE THREE HOTELS IN OUR AREA, ALL OF ABOUT THE SAME STANDARD, AND ALL WITH BARS AND RESTAURANTS. THE AREA HAS MANY CAFES AND RESTAURANTS OFFERING EUROPEAN AND FOREIGN FOOD. {FASHION :}AS ALWAYS, FASHION IS CONSTANTLY CHANGING BUT LOCAL PEOPLE (ESPECIALLY TEENAGERS) USE THE MANY FASHION SHOPS TO KEEP UP WITH THE LATEST STYLES. {ACTIVITIES :}WE HAVE TWO CINEMAS IN OUR AREA. DISCOS ARE POPULAR WITH THE YOUNG,AND SOCIAL CLUBS PROVIDE ENTERTAINMENT FOR ALL AGES.ICE-SKATING AND INDOOR BOWLING ARE POPULAR TOO, AS ARE ALL SPORTS AT THE TWO LEISURE CENTRES.
